* Design Keith Francis Strohm
* Editing Skip Williams
* Creative Director Steve Winter
* Illustrations Glen Michael Angus and John Snyder

* Valuable Assistance and Inspiration Bruce Cordell (the original Bruis Blackheart) and Penny Williams

* Graphics Coordinators Dawn Murin and Paul Hanchette
